refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns a copy of the given instance with new schema reference.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The function creates a new instance of XMLType by copying the given one and assigning a new schema URL to it. Parameter schema_url specifies a new URL; if it is omitted then a non-schema based instance is created like the XMLType.createNonSchemaBasedXML() function.
The returned copy has an internal "validated" flag set to 0, even if the new URL is equal to the URL of the original instance.

refsect2.title: schema_url
refsect2.para: The location of a schema of a new instance.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The member function returns a new instance of XMLType.

example.title: Converting a non schema-based instance to schema-based one
example.para: The procedure creates a schema-based copy of a sample non schema-based instance.
